content: this legal text provides an overview of a specific case involving two parties referred to as 719 and an unnamed party the case revolves around a payment of 80 euros and has been ongoing for almost two months ms c is required to pay mr v v 50 of their coowned assets amounting to €45000 related to a credit claim for certain real estate units ms c is responsible for any remaining loan installments and charges associated with these units the payment must be made through a nontransferable cashiers check or bank transfer by a specified date ms c is responsible for choosing a notary and informing mr v v of the chosen date the legal text explains the progress of a cause regarding the dissolution of community property and mentions the possibility of division through a consensual agreement or a judicial process the text then provides details about a mediation meeting between the parties where they expressed their willingness to proceed with mediation and discussed the sums claimed for the coownership share the meeting was adjourned for an inperson continuation a conciliatory agreement was reached specifying the payment and conditions for both parties the text also mentions the mediation fee and tax credits finally the proceedings are declared closed and details for the payment of fees are provided
